title: Dikaya Gar
text:
Dikaya Gar () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Kultayevskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Permsky%20District">Permsky District</a>, <a href="Perm%20Krai">Perm Krai</a>, Russia. The population was 103 as of 2010. There are 7 streets.
Geography.
Dikaya Gar is located 29 km southwest of <a href="Perm%2C_Russia">Perm</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Polyudovo is the nearest rural locality.
